item.title: Signify to GMail RSS signature Converter
item.description: Just wanted to share this small python code that naïvely converts a signify parameter file into a RSS file that can be used in GMail with the Random Signature Appender lab feature. It doesn’t support any magical option of Signify (alignment, variable replacement). However, current lab feature has limitation to 96 chars in signature. This definitively sucks.
